title: Everyday, Average Jones
description: When Melody needed someone to rescue her, she knew that navy SEAL Harlan "Cowboy" Jones was just the man for the job. But afterward, when things got more intimate, she had to write it off to an adrenaline rush. After all, she was looking for an ordinary guy---and Cowboy was anything but. Too bad their encounter left Melody with more than just memories...Then Cowboy paid Melody a surprise visit and saw her burgeoning belly. That did it---he had to convince her that they were meant to be together! That he could be as ordinary as the next guy. And he'd do it, too---even if it meant twenty-four-hour-a-day, hands-on contact...
author: Suzanne Brockmann
